column5: Are there any outfitters for canoe trips to Woodland Caribou? I see that Red Lake outfitters used to, but they are out of business I guess. Tried to contact Goldseekers but neither my friend or I have heard from them. Thanks.

At one time, Echo Lake Lodge, west of Red Lake, used to offer extended canoe trips in the area you are asking about. The camp has changed hands, so I do not know if they still provide this service. You can check with them. Bill
Have you tried contacting the park office for a list of current outfitters? Woodland Caribou Provincial Park 227 Howey Street Red Lake, Ontario P0V 2M0 Phone: 807-727-1329
Not in the park, but I believe Loon Haunt Outfitters offer canoe trips in an area close to the park.http://www.loonhaunt.com/photos01/canoe/
Viking Outposts flies folks into the PP out of Red Lake, ON for canoe trips.https://www.vikingoutpost.com/contact-usB-
